mapper.select: select * from T_Calendars where id = #{id} and team_id = #{teamId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_calendars SET max_num = #{maxNum} WHERE team_id = #{teamId} AND id = #{calendarId}
mapper.insert: insert into T_Calendars (team_id, title, user_id, nickname, date_time, content, current_num, max_num, created_time, modified_time) VALUES (#{teamId}, #{title}, #{userId}, #{nickname}, #{dateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content}, #{currentNum}, #{maxNum}, SYSTIMESTAMP, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_calendars WHERE id = #{calendarId} AND team_id = #{teamId}
